duties_responsibilities.duty: Validate, audit, and reconcile payroll calculations and processes.
Review payroll for accuracy and compliance with policies and procedures.
Prepare payroll journal entries and assist with reconciliation of payroll bank accounts.
Ensure transactions follow current accounting principles and troubleshoot payroll process problems.
Analyze payroll and financial reports, researching variances and anomalies.
Responsible for weekly, quarterly and year-end taxes, tax reconciliations, and garnishments.

education_certification.credential: Relevant Associates degree preferred but not required
